Name: Irish Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist (discarded) & Fragata Green Olive .
EXPRESS orange zest twist over cocktail and discard.
Review: Stir well and strain into an icy cold glass and this subtly flavoured whiskey cocktail is a delicious way to chase a good evening.
History: Adapted from Harry Johnson's 1900 Bartenders' Manual .
